divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were on a cruise ship called the star heading down to alcapulco feb 21 2008 (my wifes b-day). we were sent on the cruise by my ceo of daycom systems inc. my wife and i had just recently lost our oldest son eythan to his battle with cancer. my ceo paid for us to go on vacation to get away so we booked a cruise with norwegian cruise lines. we had a suite, #11020 on the 11th deck which is forward\starboard of the ship. on feb 21st at about 11:30pm i went out on the balcony of our suite and i looked aft of the ship up at the smoke stack which was blowing north west, our heading was south east along baja california. i was out on the balcony in my robe and i just lit a smoke when i saw what looked liked a spark or something in the smoke stack. i told myself it was a spark that came out of the exhaust but i noticed it was moving in an elliptical motion away and back towards the ship. as it came back to the ship it would get out of my sight becaus eit was behind the ship. i sat there thinking if what i saw was real when about 5 seconds later it came back following the same pattern. i then called for my wife to come look at it. as she got her robe on it came and did the same pattern again. i called for my wife with more urgency since i had become really startled. she came out on the balcony and i told to just watch the sky behind the ship and to focus on the smoke stack. she gasped about 10 seconds later when she saw a gold orb of light make an elliptical pattern just as i saw 3 times before her. she asked me if it was a bird and i replied there is no way that is a bird. i tol we had to get to the very aft of the ship and then we bolted for the elevator and we got out on the 12th deck and continued aft of the ship. we sat back there for a few minutes with camera in hand. after not seeing anything we kind of lost interest and starting looking at the moon and stars. then suddenly out on the horizon north of us we saw the strange orb "turn on" and glide over the horizon for about 5 seconds before "turning off" and vanishing. my wife and i were completely freaked out and we knew we saw something not of this known world. i have recently begun to research this type of thing and have found many photos and videos that show exactly what we saw so i am convinced there is ufo's. hope this helps!! please contact me if you have any questions :)
